title: THE PERFECT DIVORCE
author: Jeneva Rose
description: Around the time of the disappearance of a woman who had a one-night stand with the attorney Sarah Morgan’s new husband, police reopen the investigation into the murder of her first husband’s mistress.

title: STRANGERS IN TIME
author: David Baldacci
description: In London in 1944, two teenagers dealing with the dangers of World War II form an alliance with a bookshop owner.

title: WILD AND WRANGLED
author: Lyla Sage
description: The fourth book in the Rebel Blue Ranch series. Almost 10 years after they first met, Cam and Dusty wind up in close proximity to each other.

title: ONYX STORM
author: Rebecca Yarros
description: The third book in the Empyrean series. As enemies gain traction, Violet Sorrengail goes beyond the Aretian wards in search of allies.

title: SAY YOU'LL REMEMBER ME
author: AbJimenez
description: Despite having a great date, Samantha asks a veterinarian to forget about her because her family is in crisis.

title: ABUNDANCE
author: Ezra Klein and Derek Thompson
description: A New York Times opinion columnist and a staff writer at The Atlantic evaluate obstacles to American progress.

title: EVERYTHING IS TUBERCULOSIS
author: John Green
description: The author of “The Anthropocene Reviewed” chronicles the fight against the deadly infectious disease tuberculosis.

title: THE ANXIOUS GENERATION
author: Jonathan Haidt
description: A co-author of “The Coddling of the American Mind” looks at the mental health impacts that a phone-based life has on children.

title: ON TYRANNY
author: Timothy Snyder
description: Twenty lessons from the 20th century about the course of tyranny.

title: FIGHT
author: Jonathan Allen and Amie Parnes
description: The authors of “Shattered” give an account of the 2024 presidential campaigns.

title: IMPOSSIBLE CREATURES
author: Katherine Rundell. Illustrated Ashley Mackenzie
description: A young boy is enlisted to save a place where magical creatures reside. (Ages 10 and up)

title: WONDER
author: R.J. Palacio
description: A boy with a facial deformity starts school. (Ages 8 to 12)

title: THE COMPLETE COOKBOOK FOR YOUNG CHEFS
author: America's Test Kitchen Kids
description: Over 100 kid-tested recipes from America's Test Kitchen. (Ages 8 and up)

title: RIVER OF SPIRITS
author: Shana Targosz
description: Senka and Poppy get lost together in the Underworld. (Ages 8 to 12)

title: THE CURSED CAMPGROUND
author: FGTeeV with Joe Caramagna. Illustrated Tim Wesson
description: Duddy inadvertently summons Bigfoot to the campground. (Ages 8 to 12)

title: LITTLE BLUE TRUCK AND RACER RED
author: Alice Schertle. Illustrated Jill McElmurry
description: Red challenges Blue to a race. (Ages 4 to 8)

title: THE GOOD EGG PRESENTS: THE GREAT EGGSCAPE!
author: Jory John. Illustrated Pete Oswald
description: Good Egg and his pals escape their carton! (Ages 4 to 8)

title: HOW TO CATCH THE EASTER BUNNY
author: Adam Wallace and Andy Elkerton
description: The Easter Bunny avoids traps in order to deliver eggs and candy. (Ages 4 to 8)

title: PETE THE CAT: BIG EASTER ADVENTURE
author: James Dean and Kimberly Dean
description: A certain rabbit needs Pete's help. (Ages 4 to 8)

title: MOSTLY WHAT GOD DOES IS LOVE YOU
author: Savannah Guthrie. Illustrated Morgan Huff
description: Children are reminded that God is always with them. (Ages 4 to 8)

title: THE HUNGER GAMES
author: Suzanne Collins
description: In a dystopia, a girl fights for survival on live TV. (Ages 12 and up)

title: THE POWERLESS TRILOGY
author: Lauren Roberts
description: A story of forbidden love between Paedyn, an Ordinary, and Kai, an Elite, in the kingdom of Ilya. (Ages 14 and up)

title: DIARY OF A WIMPY KID
author: written and illustrated Jeff Kinney
description: The travails and challenges of adolescence. (Ages 9 to 12)

title: THE WILD ROBOT
author: Peter Brown
description: Roz the robot adapts to her surroundings on a remote, wild island. (Ages 7 to 12)

title: HARRY POTTER
author: J.K. Rowling
description: A wizard hones his conjuring skills in the service of fighting evil. (Ages 10 and up)

title: WATCH ME
author: Tahereh Mafi
description: After 10 years, the Reestablishment looks to make a move on the New Republic of the West. (Ages 14 and up)

title: NOTHING LIKE THE MOVIES
author: Lynn Painter
description: In this sequel to "Better Than the Movies," Wes tries to win back the heart of Liz. (Ages 14 and up)

title: OUR INFINITE FATES
author: Laura Steven
description: Evelyn and Arden are doomed souls who repeatedly fall in love and kill each other. (Ages 13 to 18)

title: WINGS OF STARLIGHT
author: Allison Saft
description: Clarion, the successor to the throne of Pixie Hollow, is determined to confront a monster that threatens the land. (Ages 12 to 18)

title: HEARTLESS HUNTER
author: Kristen Ciccarelli
description: Rune, a witch, and Gideon, a witch-hunter, fall in love. (Ages 13 to 18)
